name: Hunt Duck (Quiet Team)
description:
Hunt Duck SOURCE :

     “Hunt Duck” is a game based on the “Duck Hunt” game, produced by Nintendo from 1984

     

----------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY : Single Mode
  • In each round, Player must shoot a specified number of ducks by looking at the green line below the ducks to go to the next level.
  • The ducks will come out one by one and Player has 3 chances to shoot a duck.
  • When Player gets a duck or the duck fly away, the system will automatically reload the ammo.
  • If Player does not shoot the specified number of ducks, the game is over and all the points scored are counted.
Duel Mode
  • Players from both sides must compete to shoot ducks to get the most score.
  • The game will ends when the 10th round is reached, the system will bring all the points to counted and decide lose—win.

----------------------------------------------------

CONTROLLER : Player 1
  • W A S D : Move the Crosshair
  • G : Shoot ( Player can custom button in Option setting )
Player 2
  • ↑ ↓ ← → : Move the Crosshair
  • M : Shoot ( Player can custom button in Option setting )

----------------------------------------------------
